text: Hello there! I'm a vendor, if you want to be more 'humane' I'm Tobias
name: Tobias

text: So... you are a merchant, why is that if I may?
name: Winston

text: Why not? new faces, new stories; new itens, new money!
name: Tobias

text: anyways. you are a adventure with that leg?
name: Tobias

text: It's the only I have. Still.
name: Winston

text: You are brave... anyways, let's trade!
name: Tobias
